channel.title: Matrix "run" problem
channel.description:
i want to startup the source i click run but get a error something like 'dont find the server file'
but i resolve that problem but now i get this error
[code]Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4096m The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size. Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
someone knows how to resolve it?
thank you

item.dc:creator: @ggallin ggallin
item.description:
@ggallin wrote:

AssassinsCRB:

im having this problem too i did what pvm said and then i got: http://gyazo.com/ce7e05e4bdc7982085e9c91867832e2b

javahowto.blogspot.de

6 Common Errors in Setting Java Heap Size

Two JVM options are often used to tune JVM heap size: -Xmx for maximum heap size, and -Xms for initial heap size. Here are some common mi...


a quick google search always can help.
except it seems something in your program is also missing, google that error as well.

item.title: Matrix "run" problem
item.dc:creator: @PvP_Bobby PvP Bobby
item.description:
@PvP_Bobby wrote:

If it is the new Matrix[718 or 723 or whatever it is], the cache came with the server.

@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx256m -Xss2m -Dsun.java2d.noddraw=true -XX:CompileThreshold=1500 -Xincgc -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+UseParNewGC -cp bin;./clientlibs.jar; Loader true false 3
pause

Use that bat for the Client. I added the args “true false 3” at the end and they are, respectively, “Connect to Localhost” “Use Lobby” “Revision Number”.

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix "run" problem
item.dc:creator: @PvP_Bobby PvP Bobby
item.description:
@PvP_Bobby wrote:

but why there are not of compilers?
I think this translates to:
But how come there are no compilers?

If So:
Because Alex(dragonkk) used Eclipse. Eclipse is an IDE. An IDE is a program to help you program (in the simplest definition possible).

Otherwise:
Can you please repeat what you said, in English.

pause

item.title: Matrix "run" problem
item.dc:creator: @anti_man444 anti man444
item.description:
@anti_man444 wrote:

you mean this?

@echo off @title RUN MATRIX java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xms2048m -Xmx1094m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

(run) in the source

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx256m -Xss2m -Dsun.java2d.noddraw=true -XX:CompileThreshold=1500 -Xincgc -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+UseParNewGC -cp bin;./clientlibs.jar; Loader pause

(run) in the client

and there are not of compilers
